text: Is there a "Grammar of Data Schemas/Constraints" similar to "Grammar of Graphics"? Any schema definition language you find interesting?

elements.text: Is there a "Grammar of Data Schemas/Constraints" similar to "Grammar of Graphics"? Any schema definition language you find interesting?

text: An interesting question. The grammar of graphics sums up how to present data for good reception by the human visual system. A grammar of data schemas would address which external constraints? There's the "human-readable" constraint, which led to JSON, YAML, TOML, etc. Schemas live in a layer on top of those formats. So what would be useful constraints in that layer?
